never played portal 2 but seen a walk through and it looks fun~

Yeah, a friend of mine did the modulation, but itâs a bit of a challenge making your voice do the thing where people CAN modulate it like that. I have an immense amount of respect for Ellen McLain. Apparently she based GLaDOS off the way automated voices sound, so the process of creating GLaDOS was: A human imitating a computer that was trying to be human, the result of which was then put back through to make it sound artificial.


I highly recommend the games, by the way. They arenât just two of my favorite games, but some of my favorite works of fiction period.
